feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
